query:
SELECT u.id as user_id, ui.full_name as ui_full_name, u.user_role as user_role
                     FROM users u
                     JOIN user_info ui ON ui.user_id = u.id
                     ORDER BY
                        CASE WHEN u.id = $1 THEN 0 END,
                        CASE u.user_role 
                            WHEN 'Leader' THEN 1
                            WHEN 'Manager' THEN 2
                            WHEN 'Agent' THEN 3
                        END;
